actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that the interest rate on mortgages secured by one-to four-family residences and insured under title II of the National Housing Act or guaranteed under chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, be negotiated between the borrower and lender, and that lenders may not charge discount points on such mortgages in excess of their acquisition costs.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to direct that the interest rate on mortgages secured by one- to four-family residences and insured or guaranteed under specified Federal laws, be negotiated between borrower and lender. Prohibits lenders from charging discount points on such mortgages in excess of their acquisition costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the interest rate on mortgages secured by one-to four-family residences and insured under title II of the National Housing Act or guaranteed under chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, be negotiated between the borrower and lender, and that lenders may not charge discount points on such mortgages in excess of their acquisition costs.
